Description.Metadata: Main title, credits, and end title lacking. DLC
The 16 mm. neg trk goes with the 35 mm. archival neg. DLC
Introduction in Japanese and songs in English and Japanese.

Appears to be footage of a Beatles concert given on 6/30/66 at the Nippon Budokan Hall, Tokyo, Japan; concert was filmed on 6/30/66 and broadcast in color by NTV (Japanese television) on 7/1/66, but cannot determine if ever shown by NBC per Fred Gilmore, Science Librarian, Univ. of Michigan Engineering/Transportation Library, 10/7/91; dates of 3/15/68 and 3/18/68 appear on cans, but cannot determine to what these dates refer.
NBC inventory box no. 67 and 1184. DLC
Reference sources used: Wiener, A. The Beatles : a recording history, p. 99; Lewisohn, M. The Beatles live, p. 192, 199.
Restricted; videocassettes only may be viewed; no physical handling by researchers.
Received: 7/16/86; arch neg and neg trk; gift; NBC Television Collection.
NBC Television Collection (Library of Congress) DLC
